description: Uses Docling to process input documents connecting to your instance of Docling Serve.

inputs.name: api_url
inputs.info: URL of the Docling Serve instance.

inputs.name: max_concurrency
inputs.info: Maximum number of concurrent requests for the server.

inputs.name: max_poll_timeout
inputs.info: Maximum waiting time for the document conversion to complete.

inputs.name: api_headers
inputs.info: Optional dictionary of additional headers required for connecting to Docling Serve.

inputs.name: docling_serve_opts
inputs.info: Optional dictionary of additional options. See https://github.com/docling-project/docling-serve/blob/main/docs/usage.md for more information.
